QuestData.Title: The Public Servant
QuestData.Description: As a member of the Senate and the Explorers' League, I've taken it upon myself to investigate conditions at the quarry. The troggs have run wild!$b$bThey've made a mess of the Gol'Bolar quarry. As we dug deep into the earth, they poured out, destroying our equipment and trapping many of the miners below ground.$B$BWe have to get them out of there. I've had mages working overtime to enchant these runes of return. If you can get them to the trapped miners, they can return to the surface in safety.
QuestData.LogDescription: Distribute Runes of Return to 7 Trapped Miners in the Gol'Bolar Quarry Mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: If we can remove the troggs from Gol'Bolar quarry, it will be the first step of many that we will have to undertake to rid ourselves of this menace.
QuestData.RewardText: What a relief! I'm glad to see that you were able to save so many miners, $n. I will make sure that their families are notified immediately.$B$BThe Senate will know of your role in winning back the mines.
